Direct Known Subclasses:

public abstract class Sprite
extends java.lang.Object

HW10: DAFTMAN I worked on this assignment alone, using course materials, previous work, the online Java API. Sprite.java This abstract class represents an object with a location and size, to be drawn.

Version:
